channel.title: ASP.NET MVC Framework
channel.description: Some interesting news seems to be coming out of the Alt.NET Conference in Austin.  I'd got a few IM's from folks at the conference talking about Scott Guthrie's talk. According to Jeff Palermo's blog, Scott Guthrie showed off a new ASP.NET MVC...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ryan Duffield+00:00
item.description: Having used Castle's MonoRail for over two years now it's great to see Microsoft finally getting on board. The Castle team's response to this news was also very appropriate.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Duffield
